post.author: Admin
post.title: We need help on Senior Band Night
post.description:
Dear Band Families,
We only have a few weeks before we will be honoring the senior band members.
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

We only have a few weeks before we will be honoring the senior band members. On Friday, October 16, 2015, dinner for them and their immediate family will be served at 5:30PM, right after practice and before the football game. The rest of the band will enjoy pizza, bakery and beverages. Obviously we need a few volunteers to help make sure this event goes smoothly.

Thank you to everyone that has already responded to our request for help! We are almost there but we need of a few more volunteers. Please view the Signup Genius link and if you could help out it would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Helen Kelly
Hospitality
